tool_description: This unique service supplies minute to minute in play outcomes analysis for major football, basketball and hockey events
name: Sport Outcomes
title: Sport Outcomes

api_list.name: All Teams
api_list.description: Retrieve list of teams for which there is data available.

api_list.name: Leagues
api_list.description: Leagues currently covered within the Data services

api_list.name: KOI-Glossary
api_list.description: Retreive a glossary for all KOI's currently offered

required_parameters.name: languagecode
required_parameters.description:
en = English
ru = Russian
fr = French

api_list.name: ScoreClassifications
api_list.description: Score Classifications as defined in the KOIs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-outcomes.p.rapidapi.com/ScoreClassifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-outcomes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-outcomes.p.rapidapi.com/ScoreClassifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-outcomes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Goal's by Classification
api_list.description: Retreive Team Goals scored based on classification requested in structured JSON (English)

api_list.name: Today's Fixtures
api_list.description: Todays games and the current status of them.

api_list.name: KOI-Numerics
api_list.description: Retreive KOI's in raw numeric form

required_parameters.name: gameMinute
required_parameters.description: The time elapsed in event, supply zero (0) to get pre match KOI's

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: The event Sport, 1= Soccer , 2 = Hockey , 3= Basketball

api_list.name: KOIs

required_parameters.name: gameMinute
required_parameters.description: The time elapsed in event, supply zero (0) to get pre match KOI's

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: The event Sport, 1= Soccer , 2 = Hockey , 3 = Basketball

api_list.name: Goal's by Fixture - RAW
api_list.description: Retreive Goals scored with classification in raw string format (English)

api_list.description: Retrieve Goals scored with classification in structured JSON (English).
